title: RT News - October 15, 2019 (12:00 MSK)
text: An “anti-Trump crusade” and "bias” at the highest levels a CNN whistle-blower claims 'bombshell revelations' about the channel. Violence in the restive Spanish region of Catalonia as a Madrid court hands down lengthy sentences on separatist leaders. Democratic presidential hopefuls in the US call for changes to an HIV disclosure law, that lands people in jail when they fail to reveal their health status. There's been some strong reaction to that. The United Arab Emirates roll out the red carpet for President Putin who has just landed in the capital Abu Dhabi for talks with the Crown Prince.
description: An “anti-Trump crusade” and "bias” at the highest levels a CNN whistle-blower claims 'bombshell revelations' about the channel
